content: General Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Oct 2018I just started my first job and I have a RSP. I am interested in investing in other stuff however I am only going to turn 21 in a few months. Should I wait until I'm 21 to open a brokerage account? ?Where should I open one?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 21 Oct 2018You only have to be 18 to open a CDP account. Application form is here: https://www.sgx.com/wps/wcm/connect/920493b7-cccf-40c5-8ab6-eb0fe4f5b390/Application%2Bfor%2BOpening%2Bof%2BSecurities%2BAccount%2B%28Individual-Joint%29.pdf?MOD=AJPERES0 comments0
